fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Chronic, itchy rashes on the skin that may become red and swollen.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Erythematous, pruritic, vesicular lesions; typically on flexural areas.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Red, scaly patches on the skin that may itch or feel sore.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Well-demarcated, silvery, scaly plaques on extensor surfaces.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitor for joint involvement, lifestyle modifications
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Presence of pimples on the skin, especially on the face, chest, and back.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Open and closed comedones, papules, and pustules; primarily on face and trunk.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Unusual growths or moles on the skin that change in size, shape, or colour.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: History of sunburns, family history of skin cancer.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Asymmetric lesion with irregular borders, varying colours, diameter >6mm.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Redness and visible blood vessels in the face, sometimes with red, swollen bumps.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Spicy food, alcohol, and stress as triggers.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Central facial erythema, telangiectasia, papules, and pustules.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Loss of skin colour in patches.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Well-defined, depigmented patches on the skin, most noticeable on sun-exposed areas.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Scaly patches, dandruff, and red skin, mainly on the scalp.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Oily, scaly skin on the scalp, eyebrows, and nasolabial folds.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Mole that has changed in size, shape, or colour.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: History of sun exposure, fair skin.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: A mole with asymmetric shape, irregular borders, multiple colours, diameter >6mm.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Red, itchy welts on the skin.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Raised, red welts on the skin that blanch with pressure.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Identify triggers, emergency plan for anaphylaxis
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Itchy rash after contact with an irritant.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Localised erythema and oedema, vesicles in severe cases, usually confined to the area of contact.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Identify and avoid irritants, skin care education
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Localised pain, swelling, and redness at the site of an insect bite or sting.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Spent time outdoors in wooded areas.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Erythematous, pruritic lesion at the site of bite or sting, possible wheal formation.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoid scratching, monitor for signs of infection
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Severe itching, especially at night, with a pimple-like rash.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Close contact with an infected individual.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Burrows seen as small, raised lines on the skin, primarily between fingers, wrist, and waist.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Wash clothing and bedding in hot water, treat close contacts
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Itchy scalp, visible nits or lice on scalp hair.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Shared use of hats, combs, or brushes.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Nits attached to hair shafts, live lice may be visible on scalp.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoid sharing personal items, regular hair inspection
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Noticeable thinning of hair on the scalp.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Reduced hair density, non-scarring alopecia patterns.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular follow-up, consider cosmetic options if needed
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Red, painful, and swollen skin, often on the legs.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Warm, tender, erythematous skin with poorly defined borders.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Elevate the affected limb, monitor for signs of spreading
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Open wound with or without signs of infection.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Variable appearance based on wound age, possible signs of infection.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Cleanse with saline, apply topical antibiotics if infected
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular wound dressing changes, monitor for healing
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Swelling on the skin with a possible central punctum.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Round, mobile subcutaneous nodule, may express keratinous material.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Observation, excision if symptomatic or desired
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Pain and swelling near the tailbone, with possible discharge.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Painful nodule at the sacrococcygeal area.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Tender, erythematous swelling in the sacrococcygeal region, possible purulent discharge.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Good hygiene, hair removal to prevent recurrence
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Itchy, scaly rash on the feet, especially between the toes.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Interdigital maceration, scaling, and erythema; may have blistering.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Keep feet dry and clean, use anti-fungal powder
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Ring-shaped rash, scaly and itchy, on the body.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Well-demarcated, erythematous, annular lesion with central clearing.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoid sharing personal items, treat pets for ringworm
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Red sores or blisters that burst, ooze, and form a yellowish crust.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Close contact in schools or daycares.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Honey-colored crusting over red sores, primarily around the nose and mouth.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Good hygiene practices, wash and cover infected areas
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Red, swollen, and painful area around the fingernails or toenails.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Pain and swelling around the nail.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Erythema and oedema of the nail fold, may have purulent discharge.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Warm soaks, topical or oral antibiotics for bacterial infection
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoid nail biting or picking, proper nail care
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Painful rash with blisters in a band on one side of the body.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Localised skin pain before rash appearance.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Clustered red blisters on an erythematous base, typically following a dermatomal distribution.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Pain control, vaccine for prevention in older adults
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Painful rash with blisters in a band on one side of the body.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Localised skin pain before rash appearance.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Clustered red blisters on an erythematous base, typically following a dermatomal distribution.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Pain control, vaccine for prevention in older adults
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Itchy, red rash in the groin area.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Erythematous, scaling rash with a clearer center, borders may be more raised.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Keep area dry, change clothes after sweating
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Red, painful skin that feels hot to the touch.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Diffuse erythema, tenderness, and swelling on exposed areas, blistering in severe cases.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Cool baths, moisturisers, NSAIDs for pain
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Telangiectasia, papules, and pustules on the central face.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Small, rough bumps on the skin, usually on the arms, thighs, or cheeks.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Painless, small, rough bumps over the upper arms, thighs, or cheeks.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Rough, scaly patches on skin exposed to the sun.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Sandpaper-like patches on sun-exposed areas, may be erythematous or skin-coloured.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular skin checks, protect skin from sun
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Six or more café-au-lait macules, freckling in the axillary or inguinal regions, neurofibromas.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Monitoring of growths, management of symptoms
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular neurologic and dermatologic exams, genetic counselling
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Tall stature, long limbs, and stretch marks not related to weight change.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Stretch marks, especially on the back and thighs, without significant weight change.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular cardiovascular, ophthalmologic, and skeletal monitoring
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Highly stretchable skin, joint hypermobility, and tissue fragility.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Skin hyperextensibility, widened atrophic scars, joint hypermobility.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: pregnancy
fields.defaultValue: Consult if pregnant (increased risk of complications)
fields.label: Pregnancy

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Physical therapy, bracing for joint stability
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoid high-impact activities, regular follow-up for complications
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Lack of pigment in the skin, hair, and eyes.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Very light skin and hair, reduced pigmentation of the iris.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular skin checks for sun damage, vision support
fields.label: Care Plan
